From: Sujith Stephen <Sujith.Stephen@chalhoub.com>
To: Alexandre Cachecho <Alexandre.Cachecho@chalhoub.com>; Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>; Mohammad Hasan <Mohammad.Hasan@levelshoes.com>; Vishnu Ramankutty <Vishnu.Ramankutty@levelshoes.com>; Rami Riman <Rami.Riman@chalhoub.com>
CC: Tarun Gulati <Tarun.Gulati@levelshoes.com>; Kristina Tokieva <Kristina.Tokieva@levelshoes.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-04-08 11:08
Subject: Property damages due to RTA excavation works - MFC Al Qouz
--------------------------------------------------
Dear All, 

 

Hope you are well. 

Please take a note on property damages (mainly wall cracks) recorded since last week due to on going excavation works behind level MFC Al QOuz. Damages are visible in pantry , office exterior / interior walls and storage areas.

Site Engineer has assessed the situation and we are expecting a visit from higher management. 

Shall keep you posted on further info soon. 

Attached images fyr.

 

Regards

Sujith

SUJITH STEPHEN​​​​
